metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25729 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
ZoneMinder before 1.34.21 has XSS via the connkey parameter to download.php or export.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.34.21-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> this vulnerability seems to have been introduced with commits 24a5b78f4c and 05f0338219. These commits are not present in xenial's, nor in focal's zoneminder packages.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.34.21-1ubuntu1').
